ygData.subject: Re: Opal responce
ygData.msgSnippet: The 2 Opals i know of are the DE Necro in the sewers, which is under the building in east FP. The other is a HE Wizard (?) in the arcane science building. The
ygData.messageBody:
The 2 Opals i know of are the DE Necro in the sewers,
which is under the building in east FP.
The other is a HE Wizard (?) in the arcane science
building. The Opal i need to find is indeed the
traitor spoken about in a different quest. But neither
the DE or HE respond to the keywords.
Looks like i will have to hire a warrior to do that
quest and see where it leads me.

Thanks anyway

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule

--- rich.hitz@... wrote:
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Somehow my email program burped and I lost your
> reply
> Countess.....
> Anyway, I can't remember what I have already sent,
> so I
> will just pick a start point.
> The last time I was in Freeport surface world was
> over 3
> weeks ago. Last time I was in the Slums of the
> surface
> was 2 months ago.
> I was talking to my wife about this and when you
> brought
> up the 2 Opals I may have blurred 2 different topics
>
> together.
> In the Slums of East Freeport, behind the leather
> shop/town wall, (I think I said West last time,
> sorry)
> my wife said there is a Dark Elf Opal Darkbriar
> behind
> one of the buildings, though she is not sure which
> one.
>
> Could you repost the Opals that you know the
> locations
> of? ie the HE Enchanter in Arcane Science is a
> definate. Now I am fuzzy on where you said the
> other
> Opal is. I don't have the thread that lead up to
> this,
> and can't remember if you said the 2nd Opal was a
> Human
> in the sewers by the other guild leaders, or if it
> was
> the DE on the surface in the Slums of East Feerport.
>
> There may be no 3rd Opal. :)
> The objet in the room I was thinking of happened at
> the
> same time that my wife and I noticed 2 differant
> Opals
> and I may have put them together by association.
> The
> object was an incomplete vent pipe and steam in the
> upper floor of the forge house (I think Groflah's
> Forge?) that was in the slum area of East Freeport.
>
> I am very sorry for any wasted time you spent on my
> earlier post. I hate Freeport anyway since my PC
> always
> locks up when I enter it. West Freeport is the
> worst
> because of the Arcane science building, followed by
> East
> Freeport because of the boat. North Freeport never
> locks me up. The Bank in Neriak slows me down
> because
> of the magic guild next to it and all the spells
> going
> off.
> This leads me to a new thread, coming soon to your
> mailbox. :)
>
> --
> Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
> Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
> 13th Season Troll SK
> Bertoxxulous
>
> "Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
> blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
> for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
> smash'm fun."
